alert.note: Alert for Gregg; Smith; Upshur (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 7:15PM CDT until April 20 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Smith County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... West central Gregg County in northeastern Texas... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 714 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Tyler, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tyler, White Oak, Gladewater, Big Sandy, Clarksville City, Liberty City, New Chapel Hill, Winona, Union Grove, Warren City and Pritchett. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
